thread.title: The Memes Reacting To Tomi Lahren’s Suspension From ‘The Blaze’ Are Pretty Ruthless
thread.title_full: The Memes Reacting To Tomi Lahren’s Suspension From ‘The Blaze’ Are Pretty Ruthless

author: Brandon Wenerd
title: The Memes Reacting To Tomi Lahren’s Suspension From ‘The Blaze’ Are Pretty Ruthless
text:
Yesterday Glenn Beck’s conservative new outlet, The Blaze, suspended Tomi Lahren for a week after she made comments on The View about being pro-choice. Since Tomi Lahren is one of the most controversial figures in media, Twitter came out firing right away with memes galore.
Here are a few of the best.
tomi lahren: "liberal snowflakes will silence anyone who doesn't say what they think"
tammy: says she's pro choice
the blaze: fires her pic.twitter.com/vgnnb4e0US 
— germaine (@alluneedisswift) March 20, 2017 
me watching tomi lahren get destroyed by her own fanbase pic.twitter.com/NmX4AI0wWP 
— allie (@alliemj22) March 20, 2017 
Tomi Lahren: I'm pro choice. 
The right: break out the torches and pitchforks. Destroy her!
The rest of us: pic.twitter.com/MiiTzB3Wi6 
— Revised. Redacted. (@PricklyPundit) March 20, 2017 
When Tomi Lahren demonizes women's marches, but then reveals herself to be pro-choice. pic.twitter.com/OkadVCx439 
— Sam Rodriguez (@SammyR0d) March 21, 2017 
Me seeing Tomi Lahren get suspended, but then seeing she got suspended for supporting women's rights pic.twitter.com/V3uLsk6gvJ 
— Trevor Jones (@jonestm97) March 21, 2017 
Watching all the conservatives turning on Tomi Lahren for her pro choice stance like pic.twitter.com/jV0uAcs4fY 
— Supreme Hakim (@PhoenicianState) March 20, 2017 


Stay strong, Tomi:
This life can be lonely. Thank you to those-on all sides of the political spectrum-for the support. Agree/disagree, it means the world. ❤ 
— Tomi Lahren (@TomiLahren) March 21, 2017
